title: Were the championship skins available yet?
body: I just wanted to buy championship kalista but i didnt play for a week so i didnt know if the championship skins were available. Are they available soon or were they available already?

replies.body: Championship skins won't always be available at the store, but we'll usually announce their return.  Bookmark our [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales)  page to keep an eye out!
Those skins haven't come back yet, they will likely be out soon as we get closer to Worlds.
